<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TableExclusionTableList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TableExclusionTableList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TableExclusionTableList = Class.create();
TableExclusionTableList.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	process: function() {
    		var tl = new TableExclusionTableChoiceList();
    		tl.setApplyExclusions(true);
    		tl.setCurrentTableName("sys_df_table_exclusion");
    		tl.setFieldName("table");
    		tl.setShortList(true);
    		return tl;
    },

    type: 'TableExclusionTableList'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
